text: John Bertil "Bebben" Johansson (22 March 1935 – 5 May 2021) was a Swedish football player. He played as a striker. He played for IFK Göteborg. He was also a football manager. Johansson died on 5 May 2021, at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Swedish footballers Category:Swedish football managers Category:Sportspeople from Gothenburg
title: Bertil Johansson
